tool_description: Returns a page number and position from Bing search results using your requested search parameter and domain name.
name: BingSearch
title: BingSearch

api_list.name: GetPageAndPosition
api_list.description: Finds where a domain name is listed in Bing search results

required_parameters.name: DomainName
required_parameters.description: the domain name you wish to find in the search results

required_parameters.name: Query
required_parameters.description: The phrase or keywords you wish to search by
